H0.text: Artemisinin and derivatives are drugs found to act especially well on which disease. Malaria

H1.text: Artemisinin and derivatives are drugs found to act especially well on which disease. Leishmaniasis

H2.text: Artemisinin and derivatives are drugs found to act especially well on which disease. Toxoplasmosis

H3.text: Artemisinin and derivatives are drugs found to act especially well on which disease. Agues

A4.text: Artemisinin-based combination therapies (ACTs) have become standard treatment worldwide for P. falciparum malaria as well as malaria due to other species of Plasmodium.

A5.text: Artemisinin and its derivatives are all potent antihelmintics. Artemisinins were later found to possess a broad spectrum of activity against a wide range of trematodes, including Schistosoma japonicum, S. mansoni, S. haematobium, Clonorchis sinensis, Fasciola hepatica, and Opisthorchis viverrini.
